title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Month is 4.3.
The difference of Value of wealth in billion euros between the highest and lowest Month is 20.8.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Month is 4.3.
The difference of Value of wealth in billion euros between the highest and lowest Month is 20.8.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
Second maximum Value of wealth in billion euros is found at Month Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany).
The highest Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has 20.8 more Value of wealth in billion euros than the lowest Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).

The Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros, followed by Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany), and Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany). Down to the Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) which is the lowest.
Overall Value of wealth in billion euros has decreased over the Months.
Month Margarita Louis Dreyfus (Louis Dreyfus Switzerland), and Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden) have a similar Value of wealth in billion euros that is 5.6.
The average Value of wealth in billion euros in all 10 Months is 8.68.

data.Month: Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden)
